For several years now the live music and indie recording scenes in the New York area have blossomed. One artist who has helped define both scenes is folk singer and songwriter Caroline Doctorow. Through seven albums that seamlessly mix originals and covers, Doctorow has become a favorite of folk and college DJÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s across the country. Her voice has been called wondrous, velveteen and one of those pure clear voices that is captivating no matter what she sings.

This record boasts several stellar musical guests including Nanci Griffith, John Sebastian, The Kennedys, Eric Weissberg, and Happy Traum.
